title: (x) Le Printemps de Septembre - Plantin Headline Bold Condensed with altered e {Akira}
content:
hi all! having a tough time here. windsor bold condensed is similar, although this seems more fine. no slant/overt wackiness to it like windsor. but seems of that era. softer condensed goudy style. any leads?

thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016001502im_/http:/typophile.com/files/648202d04223edfcfd9f316ed363ef3d079e762a_m_5104.jpg)
author: justinthomaskay

comments.content:
FWIW: It can pay off to run a search before posting: [this came up a couple of times before.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016001502/http:/typophile.com/search/?keys=Le%20Printemps%20de%20Septembre)  
F
oops. thanks florian, i did search but must have typed it incorrectly.
